frontmatter.title: Crossplane
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as design for Crossplane
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Collaboratively manage infrastructure with your coworkers synchronously sharing the same designs.
featureList: Highly extensible backend that enables you to orchestrate applications and infrastructure no matter where they run.
Highly configurable frontend that lets you define the declarative API it offers.
Provides reliability and security features like Role Based Access Control (RBAC) to orchestrate everything - not just containers.
